description: Do Gether is a social media platform that allows users to find like-minded people with the same interests and connect with them. The main idea is to bring together people with similar interests so they can pursue them together.

features.title: Features
features.filters: Versatile search and filter options, including activity, level, time, location, and required number of participants.
features.personalization: Personalize your profile with images, interests, and a description.
features.posts: Classic posting function with comments, reactions, and polls.

techstack.title: Tech Stack
techstack.ssr: Combination of Laravel SSR and SPA using Inertia.js for optimal performance.
techstack.inertia: Inertia.js provides page caching and component loading.
techstack.api: REST API for data management and DTO conversion.
techstack.performance: Use of lazy loading, prefetching, and SEO optimization.

installation.title: Installation
installation.step1: Copy the .env.example file and rename it to .env.
installation.step2: Fill in the database and mail information (e.g., using a Gmail App Key).
installation.step3: Create a database and add the connection details in the .env file (MariaDB is recommended).
installation.step4: Run the following commands: composer install, php artisan key:generate, php artisan migrate, php artisan db:seed, php artisan serve.
installation.step5: Open the provided URL in your browser.
installation.step6: Install the frontend dependencies: npm install, npm run dev.
